flawed_nl_solution:
Bruce has 20 more legos than Kent who has 40 so Bruce has 20+40 = <<20+40=60>>60 legos
Simon has 20% more legos than Bruce who has 60 legos so that's 0.2*60 = <<20*0.01*60=21>>21 more legos
20% more is 21 legos and Bruce has 60 so Simon has 21+60 = 81 legos
#### 81

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
